title: Complete Network Outage
description: Total network failure affecting all departments. Vendor took 18 hours to restore basic connectivity, with full service not restored for 26 hours.
root_cause: Primary and backup network switches both failed due to power surge during storm. Vendor had not implemented proper surge protection.
vendor_actions_taken: Vendor struggled to diagnose issue, required escalation to manufacturer support, replacement hardware delayed
business_impact: Severe - complete business disruption, estimated $50,000 in lost productivity
follow_up_actions: Vendor committed to equipment upgrades (not completed)

title: Security Breach - Firewall Misconfiguration
description: External security audit discovered critical firewall misconfiguration exposing internal systems to internet for approximately 6 weeks. No actual breach detected but exposure was significant.
root_cause: Firewall rules incorrectly configured during routine maintenance, no validation performed
vendor_actions_taken: Fixed configuration immediately after discovery, but demonstrated lack of security best practices
business_impact: Critical - potential data exposure, compliance risk, reputation damage

title: VPN Service Failure
description: VPN infrastructure failed during critical quarter-end period, preventing remote workers from accessing systems for 12 hours.
root_cause: VPN server capacity exceeded, vendor had not scaled infrastructure despite growth warnings from Daleel
vendor_actions_taken: Eventually added capacity but should have been proactive, not reactive
business_impact: High - 40 remote workers unable to complete quarter-end tasks, missed deadlines
follow_up_actions: Vendor added monitoring for capacity utilization

title: Router Failures - Recurring Issue
description: Fourth occurrence of router stability issues in 6 months. Vendor still unable to provide permanent solution.
root_cause: Underlying hardware or configuration issue unresolved
vendor_actions_taken: Vendor continues to apply temporary fixes, has not identified root cause despite 6 months of recurring issues
business_impact: Medium per incident, but pattern shows systemic failure
follow_up_actions: Procurement engaged to identify replacement vendors
Formal notice sent to vendor management
